definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
China Mass Media International Advertising Corp
pinyin: guang3 er2 gao4 zhi1 guang3 gao4 gong1 si1
fu2 wu4 guang3 gao4 xie2 yi4

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌广告商拥有更多的广告费用。

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌广告商拥有更多的广告费用。

sentences.english: Ads close to top-of-the-page headlines did well.
sentences.chinese: 靠近页顶标题的广告表现良好。

sentences.english: The expenses on advertising and sales promotion will be shared between our two parties.
sentences.chinese: 广告和促销的费用由我们双方均摊。

sentences.english: Full-page newspaper ads hawk the fast-selling J3 hatchback.
sentences.chinese: 整版报纸广告都在报道J3的销售。

sentences.english: I’m the one who put the ads there.
sentences.chinese: 我正是那个把广告放在那里的人。

sentences.english: How does that ever allow you to advertise in connection with sports?
sentences.chinese: 这样你们就可以做与体育赛事有关的广告了？

sentences.english: Creativity is the soul of the advertisement, which endows the advertisement with vitality and life.
sentences.chinese: 创意是广告的灵魂，是赋予广告精神与生命的活动。

sentences.english: Creativity is the soul of the advertisement, which endows the advertisement with vitality and life.
sentences.chinese: 创意是广告的灵魂，是赋予广告精神与生命的活动。

sentences.english: The profession and the public do not appreciate that advertising claims come without proof in the case of diets.
sentences.chinese: 医生同业和大众没有察知广告所宣称的饮食并无论证。

sentences.english: Any indecent advertisements need to be censored.
sentences.chinese: 任何粗鄙或有伤风化的广告，应该删去。

sentences.english: Their goal is to serve me a relevant ad everywhere I am.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标是无处不在的为我提供相关的广告。

sentences.english: But not all advertisements are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，并非所有的广告都真实可靠。

sentences.english: Many of Meteor Shower's ads fall in that category.
sentences.chinese: 《流星雨》中的很多广告就分属此类。

sentences.english: So then I wondered, who is the ad targeting, who is the buyer?
sentences.chinese: 接着我又想，这则广告的对象是什么人，买主是谁？

sentences.english: I put up an advertisement in the newspaper for the sale of my car, but there have been no responses so far.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上登了卖车广告，但是到目前为止尚无回音。

definition: to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]
